title: Cash Flow Helper
description: Analyze a client's cash flow situation and generate actionable improvement strategies.

body.content: I'm advising a small business client on cash flow management.

body.label: Cash Flow Issue
body.placeholder: Describe the cash flow problem — e.g. 'Revenue is seasonal, struggles to cover rent in slow months' or 'Customers pay net-60 but expenses are due monthly'
body.tip: What's the core cash flow challenge?

body.content:
Please help me as an SBDC advisor by providing:

1. Cash Flow Red Flags — identify potential issues based on the information provided
2. 5-7 Specific Improvement Strategies — practical actions tailored to this business and industry
3. Talking Points — a concise list I can use in our advising session to guide the conversation
4. Monthly Metrics to Track — what numbers should they watch and what targets to set
5. Questions to Ask — 5 follow-up questions to better understand their situation

Keep recommendations practical for a small business owner without a finance background. Use plain language.
